front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions for Abstract Error Report in Multi-Layer Traffic Engineered Networks

abstract.t: This document provides extensions to the Resource ReserVation Protocol-Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) to support the report of abstract error information across the multi-layer network boundary using Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) User Network Interface (UNI). Such abstract error information is useful for efficient protection and restoration of multi-layer Label Switched Paths (LSPs), and is helpful in fault localization and diagnostics in the multi-layer networks.
